Package cs2263_project

package cs2263_project
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    GameBoard.TileIterator
    Defines a function that accepts a tile - for the purpose of passing a lambda
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    App
    The entry point of the application.
    Game
    This class keeps track of all of the game-logic and is responsible for holding and communicating changes to all of the data classes
    GameBoard
    Holds the Tiles the players have played, as well as a collection of behaviours related to managing game board state
    GameInfo
    This class stores the information on the different corporations, the primary and secondary bonuses, and the costs, per size
    Player
    This class stores the data and holds the interactive methods for each player
    StartUI
    Contains the UI components related to starting and loading games
    Tile
    Holds information about the tiles that are held and played
    TileDeque
    Holds the list of Tiles to be drawn from and discarded to
